rmi.client.events

Interface IClientGameEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientGameEventController, ClientGameEventListenerAdapter

    public interface IClientGameEventListener

      • onTeamHit

        void onTeamHit(int team,
             int health,
             int maximumHealth)
        occurs when a team makes a successful missile hit
        Parameters:
        team - the team index of the team that got hit
        health - the health of the team that got hit
        maximumHealth - the maximum health of the team that got hit
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an java rmi related exception occurs

      • onGameTurnEnd

        void onGameTurnEnd(int turn,
                 MapSlot slot,
                 Location location)
        occurs when a turn ends
        Parameters:
        turn - the index of the team whose turn has ended
        slot - the condition of the map slot that got fired upon
        location - the location of the map slot that got fired upon
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an java rmi related exception occurs
